column5: Are you allowed to take preserved baits across the border into Canada, like leeches, minnows. Check out magicproducts.com and maybe that will help. Thanks for any info. Mike

Not to hi-jack the thread already, but I have never heard of preserved leeches. Do they work? How do you do it/or where do you buy them? BTW, I have no problems with preserved/salted minnows at the border.
magicproducts.com, I found them at cabelas. Worth a try.
Cool. They look like they would be. Thanks.
